attr.title: Snapdragon
attr.desc:
In this dragon-stretching minimalist roguelike you can stretch your body, shrink it and swap the positions of your head and tail to attack enemies or avoid damage.
The game features grid-locked turn-based movement, procedural stages, randomized items, and classic bump-combat.
attr.inst: Ready to Run! Thanks to sarn (one of the programmers from Team Bugulon) for giving us permissions to distribute game files!
